title: Does an especial tendency to draw from experience undermine the artist's imagination? - Quora

response.answer_text: How can you ignore experience. We all draw from experience. The young, the old, even the "intuitive". It's like experience is bricks, and imagination is the structure. Can you make the structure without the building material?Having said that, I've seen some tests that show that kids have a vastly more potent imagination than adults
